accordion.title: Accordion
accordion.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

alert.title: Alert
alert.description: Alert components for displaying important information to users with various styles and variants.

alertDialog.title: Alert Dialog
alertDialog.description: Modal dialogs for action confirmation and displaying important information with various styles and variants.

basic.title: Basic Components
basic.description: Core UI components for alerts, dialogs, avatars, badges, and buttons.

layout.title: Layout & Utilities
layout.description: Layout components, code examples, and utility components for demonstrations.

howToUse.title: How to use
howToUse.description: Select a component category above to view all available options, code examples, and interactive demonstrations. Each component includes detailed documentation and usage examples.

accordion.title: Accordion Components
accordion.description: Interactive accordion components with various styles and configurations

default.title: Default Accordion
default.description: Standard accordion with basic styling and functionality.

outline.title: Outline Accordion
outline.description: Accordion with outline border styling for better visual separation.

box.title: Box Accordion
box.description: Accordion with box-style containers for each item.

boxContained.title: Box Contained
boxContained.description: Box accordion with contained styling and rounded corners.

tabs.title: Tabs Accordion
tabs.description: Accordion styled to look like tabs with horizontal layout.

customTrigger.title: Custom Trigger
customTrigger.description: Accordion with custom trigger elements and styling.

disabled.title: Disabled State
disabled.description: Accordion with disabled items and proper accessibility.

highlightActive.title: Highlight Active
highlightActive.description: Accordion that highlights the currently active item.

mediaContent.title: Media Content
mediaContent.description: Accordion with rich media content like images and videos.

multiple.title: Multiple Expanded
multiple.description: Accordion that allows multiple items to be expanded at the same time.

expandIcon.title: Expand Icon
expandIcon.description: Accordion with custom expand icon instead of the default arrow.

icon.title: With Icons
icon.description: Accordion with icons for each item for better visual identification.

contained.title: Contained Accordion
contained.description: Accordion with box-style containers for each item.

demo.title: Interactive Demo
demo.description: Try out the accordion component below. Click on any item to expand or collapse it.

accessible.title: Is it accessible?
accessible.content: Yes. It adheres to the WAI-ARIA design pattern.

styled.title: Is it styled?
styled.content: Yes. It comes with default styles that matches the other components' aesthetic.

animated.title: Is it animated?
animated.content: Yes. It's animated by default, but you can disable it if you prefer.

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: Click on any variant above to see interactive demonstrations, code examples, and detailed documentation for using the component.

auth.passwordProtected: This content is password protected. Please enter the password to continue.

passwordGroups.title: Password Groups Configuration
passwordGroups.description: Each section ID is automatically assigned to a password group based on the configuration below.
passwordGroups.coversAllSections: This group covers all sections not explicitly assigned to other groups
passwordGroups.coversSpecifiedSections: This group covers only the specified sections

soft.description: Alerts with soft colors and transparent backgrounds.

bootstrap.title: Bootstrap Style
bootstrap.description: Bootstrap-style alerts with borders and backgrounds.

withActions.title: Alert with Actions
withActions.description: Alerts with action buttons for interactivity.

usage.description: Click on any variant above to see interactive demonstrations, code examples, and detailed documentation for using the component.

info.description: Essential UI components that form the foundation of modern web interfaces. Each component is designed for accessibility, customization, and ease of use.
